data.message:
I tried to call shady
But a bit hazy 
He'll of a week
Crap can hardly speak
Don't know what to do
Perhaps call the crew 
T
Go out and paint the town
But something always goes down
Perhaps just listen to M
Maybe just call Jim 
But he can be a tool
Maybe look for wool
Dang I can't think
Maybe another drink
Kidding gave that up
Screw it give me a cup
Or don't give me anything
Just your pinky ring
This thought just came to me
What it like to be free
I forgot somehow 
I might throw a cow
A tantrum is what I need
My heart no longer bleeds
